bufferValue.description:
The value of the buffer indicator.
Value between 0 and max.

hideLabel.description: Whether to hide the text label within the progress. Defaults to `false`.

max.description:
The value of the max progress indicator.
Default value is 100.

min.description:
The value of the min progress indicator.
Default value is 0.

value.description:
The value of the progress indicator.
Value between 0 and max.
